message: Let's be fair and start with a reasonable split. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. It's more than generous considering the inflation will affect you more.
I appreciate your fairness, but I think 55/45 is a more equitable split given the inflation factor. It's still a good deal for both of us.

I see you're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I'm not budging that much. I'll meet you halfway between my original offer and your counteroffer. 58% for me, 42% for you is still a good deal considering the circumstances.
